transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ah, sir, Vidushi baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se, samajh mein ek cheez puchni thi aapse.
Customer: Mera kal baat hua tha aapke sath, to jo 93 number hai usme kisi lady ne mujhse baat kiya tha, lekin main unki language proper samajh nahi pa rahi thi aur na hi wo meri language samajh pa rahi thi. To wo kiska number hai matlab?
Executive: Wo mera office madam hai, boliye.
Customer: Achcha, to unki na miss call aayi thi kal, to uski wajah se ek ticket open hua hai, to mere ko ye ticket close karna hai abhi. Aapko koi doubt ya koi query to nahi hai na? Already waise to hamara dekho kal discussion ho hi gaya hai sari cheezon pe.
Executive: Dekhiye madam madam main workshop mein niche thoda kaam mein chal raha, ek aadha ghante mein main phone karte, rukiye. Thoda slow baat karna, aap bolna fatafat fatafat baat kiya to kaise madam thoda samay dena thoda hallu baat karna samjho to customer ko.
Customer: Achcha achcha achcha, theek hai, theek hai. Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know who called from 93 number.

- Wants to close the ticket opened due to missed call.



Resolution:

- Executive informed that it was his office madam.

- Asked to call after half an hour due to work.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call after half an hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- missed call, ticket, language issue, follow up
